I had an amazing experience from the first consultation through completing sleeves on both arms. Check out the work of my favorite artist, Jason Longtin.

1.description: i'm old school in pretty much everything i do and i don't abide pretentiousness or hipster bull shit. since i've not been in a tattoo shop in more than 20 years i was concerned i'd be faced with exactly that. for me it was essential that i have an artist who was committed and had his own thing but who also understood that the old flash deserves as much respect and attention as any new designs do. my artist was ben wahhh. he filled the bill.my sailor jerry pin up girl was getting a little worse for wear and tear as she was done some decades back. ben suggested we refresh her as she would be right next to the new piece and we didn't want her looking tired by comparison. as i was batting around a few ideas for the new one he patiently helped me settle on a just the right classic. he took plenty of time helping me decide on placement and size. it seemed just as important to him as to me... good guy.the shop is big and clean and full of action and good vibes. the staff seemed to like each other and it was a very pleasurable couple of hours. i love my new tat and my refreshed pin up girl is better than new. way better.thanks ben!

55.description: This was my fourth tattoo from here. I have one from Ben one from Dustin and two from Zach. There is a reason I've only gone to deluxe, they're amazing at what they do.

9.description: Jimmy Little Rocked my 2 new Tattoos.  First of all I would not go anywhere else.  The parlor is very clean, and the staff so nice and easy going.  I felt very comfortable there and informed as it was my first time.  There is talent oozing out from the walls in this place, so you are lucky to get any of these artists.  Jimmy Little was my artist, so patient, supportive and made sure I was 100% satisfied.  He drew my tattoos (Phoenix rising, script) so flawlessly there were no changes at all!  He and I were on the same page.  His free hand script is what blew me away....  feminine, strong, and unique.  He listened to my vision and delivered. Mu husband is excited to now get his!

26.description: I went to Stephanie White at Deluxe Tattoo for my first tattoo, a triple arm band around my forearm, and she did an absolutely amazing job! She was very professional and attentive to my requests, helped select the perfect shade of green from about dozen options she had on hand, and provided expert consultation on the thickness of the bands and black outline. She was incredibly patient and precise with the placement, which I very much appreciated because the bands are perfectly straight and even all around. The parlor itself is very clean and has an inclusive feel to it. The artists all seem to get along well, which makes for a nice atmosphere. Very clean, high attention to sanitary practices, and they provide free touch-ups after healing. I highly recommend this place, and Stephanie in particular!

25.description: Loved my experience. Went in with my friend yesterday for her appointment to see if they could take me as a walk in and they were very friendly and courteous. Troy did my tattoo and was so great. He's amazingly talented! I showed him one picture of the outline I was thinking and one of the type of shading I wanted. I wasn't too sure with my wording since it was my first tattoo. He took my simple suggestions and came back 10 mins later with exactly what I had in mind. He made sure I was completely satisfied with sizing, placement etc before he started. He made sure I was at ease and knew to breathe normally and whatnot. Again, this being my first tattoo I was extremely nervous and he was very nice about it and it was over before I knew it. He took his time and was very detailed and thorough with after care instructions. It was around 20-30 mins total. Overall the shop was organized, clean, and friendly. I'm absolutely thrilled with my first tattoo and think it turned out beautiful! I would definitely recommend the shop to anyone looking for a good quality tattoo and would absolutely go back to Troy for another one!

12.description: I came here after the recommendation of some friends when my friend and I were planning to go get a tattoo. The staff were incredibly friendly and welcoming right as we walked in. I had an idea of what I wanted and came in with a few designs that I wanted to pull bits and pieces from for a new, original piece. My artist drew up a design and we got going. The whole process was easy and I felt very comfortable the entire time. Everything was super clean and all my needs were accommodated. It's been about a week and the tattoo is healing perfectly. Will definitely be back!

59.description: Before there were camera phones, before the iPad, before selfies, before hybrid cars, I won $200 on video poker slots (when they still paid out in change) and got my first tattoo.  Admittedly, it was a tramp stamp.  Admittedly, I did shots of tequila to give me liquid courage.   At that time, I fell for the "tattoos are addicting" and got another set of tattoos next to the first tattoo when I was at a tattoo convention.  I almost passed out in front of thousands of people.Needless to say, I was hesitant to get another because I didn't know what I wanted.   Fast forward 13 years, and I was ready.  I knew what I wanted, mostly on the where, and was recommended to Deluxe by a few people.  I initially had considered a different artist, but Troy was available when I wanted to go.  He was very patient with me while we worked out where it would go, how it was going to look, and what font I wanted to use, and was done within an hour.  I am very happy with my new tattoo and will going back to Troy for my next one.Why one less star?  Because I contacted the other artist via email, and needless to say, the response was a rather curt "just call to set up a consultation."  I think it should be clearer on the website who needs consultations, what their hours are, etc.  Just a thought.

21.description: Troy Taylor did a masterful job with my compass shoulder cap. I sent two rough renderings of my ideas through the form on the Deluxe website and within hours, Troy emailed me back personally and said he would be taking on my piece. They have a modern and organized approach to setting up an appointment so when I got there, Troy already had a piece drawn up for me and was very opening to changes or modifications. But he pretty much nailed it on the first try. He was very professional, appropriately quick, super easy to get along with. I will definitely be going back for more ink from him and recommending to anyone and everyone to give him and Deluxe a visit. There's a reason they are so highly rated -- they live up to the reviews! (Also incredibly fairly and appropriately priced.)

17.description: I got my first tattoo done here a week ago. I did my research on tattoo shops in Chicago and from what I seen and heard, this is the place to go. I wasn't disappointed. Everyone was professional and really attentive. The shop was well managed and very pristine. Stephanie White worked on my tattoo and did a awesome job on the line work and blending. As an artist myself, I could tell she had a great eye for detail and really treated the piece as a work of art. This is the standard to which I will judge all other tattoo shops.

10.description: My current artist is Jason Longtin. He is the only artist who has worked on my ink at Deluxe Tattoo - and though I would trust almost every artist employed here given their excellent portfolios - I will continue to get my ink done by Mr. Longtin, for as long as I can. His sketching is phenomenal and his outline and shadowing work is unlike anything I've ever seen. His attention to detail is eerily fascinating and his dedication to the job is outstanding. For my second inking, he took up on a cover-up that (too) many shied away from - and has not only done amazing work, but surpassed all expectations as well. Furthermore, he is always more than willing to listen to your ideas and concerns and will brainstorm with you until his design meets his standards and yours. Thanks Deluxe for being my ink home in Chicago! 'Til next time.XoXo

5.description: Troy Taylor did a masterful job with my compass shoulder cap. I sent two rough renderings of my ideas through the form on the Deluxe website and within hours, Troy emailed me back personally and said he would be taking on my piece. They have a modern and organized approach to setting up an appointment so when I got there, Troy already had a piece drawn up for me and was very opening to changes or modifications. But he pretty much nailed it on the first try. He was very professional, appropriately quick, super easy to get along with. I will definitely be going back for more ink from him and recommending to anyone and everyone to give him and Deluxe a visit. There's a reason they are so highly rated -- they live up to the reviews! (Also incredibly fairly and appropriately priced.)

3.description: I had to update my review and tell the Yelp world that Deluxe Tattoo is stacked with talented artists. When I found out the previous artist I had worked with no longer worked here, I still booked an appointment knowing I'd still get good service. Yes, best friend/matching tattoos are cliched, but no I don't care. My best friend of 10 years and I wanted cupcake tattoos in honor of my moving away. The day before our appointment I got a call that our artists' wife had had a baby so we could either reschedule with him or get someone new. Our new artist Zach stepped in and sketched an awesome looking tattoo. A few hours later we were done, full of pain, and looking awesome. Zach was great with his suggestions and took the time to explain placement from an artistic prospective. There's a reason my boyfriend hangs the art in our house, folks...I'm not one to have the full artsy vision others do. That's why Zach is awesome at what he does and I...am not a tattoo artist. Even though I no longer live in Chicago, I'd still make the trip here to get anything new. Why fix what isn't broken?

35.description: I rarely write reviews and this one is well deserved. My tattoo artist is Zach his talent is beyond amazing. He took on a very challenging project and promised me that I will be satisfied with the outcome. He has since proven that to be true. Zach's ability with detail and color is incredible and with every session, I am more and more amazed at what he can do. I have been receiving many compliments on my tattoo and honestly it's turning out better than I ever imagined. Besides the quality of his work, Zach is very professional and I feel comfortable with him tattooing me. It's a bonus that he's funny because it makes the process more pleasant. As far as the shop, it is always very clean and the other artists seem cool. Shout-out to Steph for always being so friendly and nice, from what I've seen she also does a great job tattooing. I love that Zach and you work next to each other. Can't wait till my next session.

19.description: OUTRAGEOUS! ... In the best possible way. I can't even wait to write this review because Troy Taylor was that awesome. I just walked in today to get a tattoo I've been wanting for a while. After just letting Troy know what kind of flower I wanted and an example of a tattoo I saw that I thought was cool he got to drawing. We went thru a couple of drafts before figuring the perfect size for my arm. He was really patient about it though and just wanted to make sure I loved it. That was really encouraging because I didn't want to be annoying. Once we got the right one and he set up everything he asked me to make sure I liked the placement by checking it out in the mirror and directed me to the mirror. It was perfect, so he got to work. I was just amazed at how fast and efficiently he worked without losing any detail or quality. It seriously took him only 45 minutes from the moment he get got going. I am so impressed! Loved the place and experience, especially since I was a walk in and didn't know what to expect. Good job Troy and Deluxe Tattoo!

28.description: Andy did an awesome job and finished up a big crow on my ribs in a little under an hour and a half. He was friendly, professional, and inks fantastic shading and clean lines! Highly recommended.

45.description: I think a lot of ppl that comment saying they arent treated well, felt ignored and judged etc just have confidence and self esteem issues. Every time I walk in here at least 3 or 4 people greet me. Most tattoo artists have been working on their craft before tattoos were a mainstream phenomenon. I dont feel sorry for ppl following a craze that know nothing about the culture but think that they arent treated with the utmost respect. you dont know shit. Dont cry like a baby if you cant get exactly what you want. listen to the artists they know what they are talking about. Good tattoos are expensive. Dont be cheap tip 20% - 30% at the least.  ok on with the review.. best tattoo shop in Chicago I recommend ZACH STUKA who has tattooed me 4 times 2 coverups. Tons of talent here I would say check out the Instagram page to find which artist matches the style you want. Every 1 in here is cool I'm always cracking up listening to them. Awesome artwork everywhere. Clean as hell. great music and fair pricing. Go to Deluxe Tattoo.

33.description: I got my first tattoo here and Troy Taylor did a great job of helping me to design exactly what I was looking for. I would recommend his work to anyone. Very professional.

43.description: I came here to get my first tattoo last week. I walked in with an idea and walked out with a creation beyond my expectations. Jason Longtin was my artist and I cannot say enough about his work to truly give it justice. He really listened to what I wanted and designed a piece so beautiful. The placement and color of this piece really made my vision come to life. Jason's work speaks for its self and the cleanliness of the place was impeccable. I will go to Jason for any work I want done in the future, no matter where I live. When you go to Jason you are paying for true artistry and quality. Cannot wait for another!!!

2.description: Like others, I had a fantastic experience at Deluxe. I'd been thinking about getting this tattoo for a couple of years. When I decided to pull the trigger I did research and chose Stephanie based on the praise for her script work. Since this was going to be my first tattoo, I didn't even care what Stephanie was like as a person-- just that she delivered on my vision. Turns out, she's friendly, down-to-earth AND a great artist. I emailed back-and-forth with her for quite some time and finally chose a date. She was courtious the entire time and super responsive. She even emailed me when she had a cancellation so I could come in early. When the date came I was pretty nervous, even thought about turning around and going home. But once I walked into Deluxe I knew I'd chosen the right place. The studio itself is large, open and has a lot of natural light. In not so many words, it's comfortable. There were quite a few customers already waiting at noon (always a good sign) but even so, I was greeted immediately and never left waiting. My tattoo itself is small and only took about 5-10 minutes to complete. Stephanie took nearly an hour with me though to get the font, placement and overall aesthetic correct. She worked on it until the font was as I'd hoped, then let me bounce back-and-forth between the mirror, the bathroom and my friend. She never acted impatient; on the contrary, she encouraged me to take a multitude of looks at different angles. Once I was committed to placement she got to work. She made conversation almost the whole time and I was super comfortable with her. She even started tattooing for just a few seconds to show me how it would feel (just like a lot of little pinches, as others have said). I smiled ear to ear when I saw the finished product. All said and done, I love what she designed, how she worked and how everyone else in the studio treated me. (Even those waiting for tattoos in the front of the shop were super friendly and offered little tips of advice). I highly, HIGHLY recommend Stephanie and Deluxe, especially for first-timers like me. [Tip: It may take some time to secure an appointment with her, so book ahead if you're serious.]

18.description: My brother and I went in to get tattoos today. Everyone was extremely helpful. Jim was our artist he was a great listener and a talented artist. He had us in and out in no time. We both are extremely happy with our tattoo I would recommend Deluxe and Jim to anyone!

41.description: Ben did an amazing job on my tat! The staff is friendly, the facilities are clean and flawless -  I wouldn't go anywhere else.

52.description: Hands down one of the best shops in Chicago. Stephanie White is super talented, friendly and easy going. Love the piece she did on my hand.

50.description: Awesome place to get a tattoo. Very friendly and professional staff. I worked with Jimmy and he was very patient in getting the tattoo aligned and sized just right.Highly recommend going here to get your tattoo.

4.description: Was in and out in 30 minuets! As a walk in! Great service people were real nice! Great work getting done around me as well! Just moved to Chicago my go to tattoo place!!

6.description: Went in on Sunday, 12/20. Had an appointment with Dustin to add a few things to a previous tattoo I already have. Shop was super clean, staff were very nice and attentive, and Dustin is a great artist who knows his way around a tattoo machine. I have zero complaints about this place. I will go back again. Keep in mind they have a minimum of $100 dollars so make sure you are getting your moneys worth. If you're only looking for a small outline of your hamster you may want to go somewhere else. If you want that hamster to look like a badass and take up half your arm this is your place.

22.description: Just got my first tattoo done by Bunny! I brought a rough idea of what I wanted and I said I want it more like this or like that, and Bunny did a sketch with which I was extremely happy and went with it! It's nothing intricate - just four words and a lip imprint - but I LOVE it.  Bunny was very professional, made me feel comfortable (guess he saw the fear in my eyes...) and made sure I was OK through out the process.  As for the price, since this is my first one, I don't have anything to compare to, but I thought $150 plus tip was a fair price for the experience, quality and service.  It helps that Bunny is a long haired, bearded eye candy!Thank you and I'll be back!!!

15.description: Before there were camera phones, before the iPad, before selfies, before hybrid cars, I won $200 on video poker slots (when they still paid out in change) and got my first tattoo.  Admittedly, it was a tramp stamp.  Admittedly, I did shots of tequila to give me liquid courage.   At that time, I fell for the "tattoos are addicting" and got another set of tattoos next to the first tattoo when I was at a tattoo convention.  I almost passed out in front of thousands of people.Needless to say, I was hesitant to get another because I didn't know what I wanted.   Fast forward 13 years, and I was ready.  I knew what I wanted, mostly on the where, and was recommended to Deluxe by a few people.  I initially had considered a different artist, but Troy was available when I wanted to go.  He was very patient with me while we worked out where it would go, how it was going to look, and what font I wanted to use, and was done within an hour.  I am very happy with my new tattoo and will going back to Troy for my next one.Why one less star?  Because I contacted the other artist via email, and needless to say, the response was a rather curt "just call to set up a consultation."  I think it should be clearer on the website who needs consultations, what their hours are, etc.  Just a thought.

57.description: First make an appointment and send ideas of the work you want to the artist ahead of time.Got work done with Stephanie and she was amazing to deal with.  She did a great job on the line work, was awesome on making sure I was ok and at ease for my first tattoo.  I highly recommend Stephanie and I already booked my next appointment.

20.description: Just got my first tattoo ever at Deluxe and couldn't be happier with the shop, artist, and piece! I was a tad nervous and they made me feel right at home and relaxed.  Jim is extremely talented and nailed it!!! I felt quickly that I was in good hands and there wasn't much to worry about.  Great experience and like most I'm sure I'll be back soon for something new. Not really sure what tattoo's cost but I felt it was reasonable for something I'll have and love forever. Not exactly something you want to cheap out on.

36.description: This shop is wonderful.. Bunny was my artist and he did a phenomenal job.. With over 13 years of experience he is gentle handed , very professional down to earth, great at placement quick and talented..He listened  very  well to what I wanted and gave very professional  opinions. . I also like that he made fine lines to make my piece delicate to flow with my other tattoos. .His prices are very reasonable too. Everyone at deluxe was very friendly,seemed to like to be at work and busy.. The shop was very clean and the receptionist was friendly... I am very pleased with Bunny's work and will be back!! :) :)

14.description: Out of all the tattoo shops in Chicago, this one came highly regarded and recommended by several people, among different groups of my friends. Walking into the shop, you will find a clean and sanitary studio with artists abound. They are customer service oriented and ensure that their guests are taken care of from the original consult to after care.My artist is Jason Vaughn. He has an amazing talent in art and tattooing and uses it well, creating exactly what you ask for using vibrant colors and careful precision. He is a very quick tattoo-giver, so you won't be spending extra money due to time. Now...when I get a tattoo, I know that I'm going to have this piece of art on my person for the rest of my life, so I greatly appreciate when my artist says it's time to stop. Additionally, I also understand that as much as I'd love to have my friends and family come back and sit there while needles are piercing my skin applying ink, well, besides being boring, it can be distracting to both me and the artist. In addition to being a health code thing, I appreciate the enforcement at the shop This is not your "run-of-the-mill" tattoo studio. This place is for the person that seriously understands what getting a tattoo means to them.The music playlist can use a bit of a make-over, however...but I tend to bring a pair of headphones and zone out to my own tunes...So, if you're looking for an amazing looking tattoo, you've found the right place - and Jason is your artist.

58.description: Juanita was amazing! She was friendly, professional, and did the most thorough Brazilian wax I've ever had. The pain was minimal thanks to her quick hands. I will be back for more waxes and to try a facial.

56.description: This is my new go-to waxing place!  Juanita is fabulous!  She's quick, as most people have said, so it cuts down on the pain and she's thorough and precise!  She's also ALWAYS friendly and welcoming and just has a very fun vibe about her.  I have an appointment to get my make-up done with her, this Saturday, and I can't wait!  From what I've seen of her work, so far, I will not be disappointed.  Ladies, if you want a great wax head to Connection Salon and see Juanita IMMEDIATELY!

29.description: I heard of this place through Lifebooker. I bought a deal for a Brazilian wax and went to see Juanita. She's so great & thorough. She took her time and was meticulous! Most people try to get you out the door as fast as they can but Juanita was careful and  took her time to do a good job. Although it took me a while to get there (I don't have a car) it was worth the commute!I will definitely be back!

42.description: I get my Brazilian waxes here and Juanita is hands-down the best. I had a Brazilian elsewhere due to being out of town which made me realize how amazing and professional she is.  Excellent quality of work; she takes her time and is meticulous.  Quality products.  You can tell she truly cares about what she does and that makes a difference!!  Keep up the good work, I for one sincerely appreciate it!!!

23.description: A friend of mine recommended Connection Salon - Ambrocio is the best! For the last 6 months I consistently see Ambrocio for hair color and blow dry. Last week I decided to completely change my hair color. Ambrosio did a phenomenal job. Hair looks absolutely wonderful. Thank you Ambrocio!

47.description: This review is for my #1 stylist/colorist Ambrosio! He's been doing my hair for a long time and I hope i'll never have to change stylists. I love to change up my look and Ambrosio is so creative and is great at new edgy cuts and color placements I get complimented on his work all the time. I've had my hair really short and am now growing it out and I'm a natural brunette, but have gone from red to copper to full blown blonde and he made it work with my skin tone and style. I just recently followed him to Connection Salon from the last place he was at. I don't think i can trust anyone else with my hair. I would recommend him to anyone and I do:)

8.description: Definitely recommend connection salon. I've been going to Alejandro for a couple of years now and always pleased with his work. Couldn't be happier with his expertise when it comes to color and cut.

31.description: Had an appt. showed up lights were off and door locked. When they called to apologize I was not provided any reasonable reason but was asked if I knocked. Seriously?!?Note this review has nothing to do with quality of haircut only quality of service.

34.description: Second time at Connection Salon with a great deal of time in between the two. Came to see Juanita for a Brazilian wax and still till date, she is the best. I've been getting Brazilians at least once a year since about 18 and I have yet to meet anyone who is as professional, patient, meticulous and friendly. She's a great professional and the thoroughness of her work keeps me coming back. If you're looking for a great place and person to wax Juanita is it!

16.description: Juanie is the ONLY person I trust with my waxing!  I haven't gone to any other salon since my first appointment with her.  She shapes them so beautifully, plays 90's R&B in the background and I get to enjoy girl talk with one of the sweetest gals.  My skin is very sensitive and she's adjusted her routine with my face so that I no longer leave with redness.  She always spends extra time to make sure I look amazing and gives honest advice.  If you have thick, unruly, thin, or even naturally faded brows, go to her!  She's also a makeup artist and can help you out with filling them in properly.  You'll leave looking like a beauty queen.  :)

13.description: Oliver is amazing!!his color is soo good, everywhere i go people ask me who did my hair

11.description: Juanita is absolutely amazing. She does a great job. It was my first time and she made me feel so comfortable. Barely any pain! Shes great. I will definitely be returing.

39.description: A co-worker (and all of her friends) recommended I see Juanita for my bikini wax.  I have very sensitive skin and every wax I had received in the past  left me bruised, sore, red and even bleeding!  I thought maybe waxing just wasn't for me... until Juanita!My friend was right- Juanita puts you at ease immediately. She is meticulous and detailed which is just want you want when it comes to skin and hair removal.  She does a great job minimizing the pain and making your special area look fabulous.The price is also very reasonable for a brazilian and never have too much trouble getting an appointment in when I need it.

37.description: Love this place! Ambrosio is the only one I trust with my long hair! Salon is clean with relaxing environment. My entire group of friends are from California and are particular about our hair. We all have very different types of hair and it always turns out perfect. Everyone is nice and accommodating... Go in and ask for Ambrosio!

0.description: I've passed this place daily for four years and never knew this place existed.This will be my new place for a haircut, awesome jobOnly $30

38.description: Love this place!Oliver is the best! Always does my hair so perfect! I always leave happy never dissapointed!

51.description: Overdue review.I bought a Groupon for a Brazilian wax here back in April. I believe I went shortly after for the service. What prompted me to come back and write a review is my most recent and wonderful wax experience today at a different salon. I referenced this experience/review I that I forgot to write as "amateur night". Sorry but in comparison, it's totally true. I've gotten waxes long enough to know the difference. I remember giving my friend a verbal review of this place literally as I was getting in the car to leave, but I didn't bother writing it out until now.Basically, the room was really small and cramped. Juanita was very nice, we chatted it up while I was there, etc. but I felt like I was participating way too much. Yes, I said participating. I understand needing to hold a leg or cheek every now and again, but I was literally getting my hands "dirty" the entire time. It's already hard enough to relax during a Brazilian so I definitely didn't appreciate the "hmm, let's see... hold here... now maybe here... yup, don't move..." instruction that went on during my entire appointment. Also I felt like she pulled such small pieces each time that the pain lasted FOREVER because it was almost constant doing bit by bit by bit for 30 minutes. No thanks. I still gave 2 stars because if I recall I was able to make an appointment the same day I called, and Juanita was cool.

27.description: Juanita is the best! She makes everything so comfortable and as painless as it can be. I drive all the way from the suburbs for my waxes. Prices are very reasonable considering how talented and knowledgeable she is. Also, she gives a punch card. After 9 visits, your 10th one is free- which is awesome!

32.description: Paid very close attention to detail. A trim actually meant a trim here!

54.description: After having a horrible experience at another salon, I frantically searched for a salon to take me in at 8:30 pm! I called them and they were so nice and willing to wait for me. I got there and I was attended by Alejandro. He cut my hair exactly how I wanted and cheered me up after being so mad. There was another stylist there as well who was hilarious but I didn't catch his name. I am definitely coming back again.

48.description: Ambrocio Duran, the new hair stylist at this salon is absolutely fantastic! I followed him here from his previous salon. He always listens to what you want and has really great ideas if you don't know what you want to do! I originally went to him because my previous salon messed up my hair, I went in and he fixed it and it looked 100x better. I have been going to him for over 2 years now and would not trade my 2 hours every other month getting my hair done by anyone but him! If you go See ambrocio i promise you will love your hair too!!

44.description: I've been going to Ambrocio for over 3 years now, and followed him here from his previous Salon. I don't even have to tell him what to do anymore, he knows exactly what to do and always makes my hour enjoyable. I would recommend him to anyone, I promise he won't disappoint!!!

24.description: Just had my first Brazilian wax ever. I get why everyone is talkin' about Juanita: she put me at ease and did a great job.

7.description: I'm always talking about my hair because I finally have the hair I've always wanted. Thank you oliver! Connection salon is very friendly and accommodating. I've been going there since 2013 and I always feel that I get great service. If you really want to feel great you should go see these lovely men !

49.description: Ambrocio is my go-to-man at Connection. I've been going to him for about 3 years now and I'll be his client for as long as he'll have me. He'll do whatever I ask, plus he'll volunteer his own ideas when I ask. He spent hours indulging me with my idea to dye a stripe of my black hair hot pink for a breast cancer walk (what a process!), and he's also currently being patient while I've decided to grow my hair long and don't let him touch it aside from color. He is very creative with up-dos to - I would definitely recommend him for any special event that you might have. Trust me, you won't look like everyone else there, but it will be beautiful and classy. Plus he's just a very nice person to spend several hours a month with.

40.description: Check it OUT! The place is nicely decked out, the chairs are super comfortable...I almost fell asleep in the shampoo chair because it is like a bed! The guy that cuts my hair is named Ambrocio and he recently moved to this salon. I'm glad he moved to this spot because I really enjoy it. They offer Aveda, Redken, Dermalogica, and many other good products. This is starting to sound like an advertisement but I'm just enthusiastic. Definitely check this place out if you are looking for a good salon and if you are looking for a great stylist then connect with Ambrocio. He has excellent attention to detail and is ninja-like with the blades!

53.description: I just came to this salon after Oliver transferred here from down the street.  I have been seeing him on and off for about 3-4 years, as I only get my hair done every 3-4 months or so, and often get it done when I have more free time while visiting family out of town.  I have always been happy with Oliver's work, and he has always been great about dealing with the outgrowth from another stylist's highlight job.I have long naturally light to medium brown hair that I put blond highlights in, and sometimes dark lowlights.  I like it to look like a natural blonde - light brown mix color, and not like a fake bleached out blond look, and Oliver always delivers.  He really has an eye for hair color and I like the fact that I don't have to give him much direction.  He can instantly look at my hair and know what to do with it, no matter what shape it happens to be in.  He is great at cutting hair as well, but I usually just get a simple trim, so I am not in as good a position to judge that.  I am picky about my colorists though, and he fits the bill!Oliver has a quick, no-nonsense, but friendly style about him.  Sometimes I wish he wasn't quite so rough about handling my head, but I can deal with that when the result speaks for itself.  Plus, I guess a little rough handling get the job done faster, as I don't have to spend as long getting my hair done with him as I do with other stylists.  The salon itself looks nice and updated with comfortable chairs and all the amenities I need.  Don't worry if you don't know the area that well and assume that its going to be a dive since its west of Western on Chicago Ave.  Its not!  Its nice inside and feels safe.

30.description: Just saw Juanita for a Brazilian and she was amazing! Her room was so clean, the whole salon was for that matter.  She was so sweet and thorough, explained everything to me as she was doing it.  I will definitely be back to see her.  Just found my wax girl!

46.description: Ambrocio has been cutting my hair at Connection Salon.  He is amazing.  Close attention to detail, style recommendations, washing, conditioning, massage, even an old school razor to clean up the neck!  What more can you ask for.  All my friends go to Ambrocio now after seeing my amazing hair cut! :)  I highly recommend this talented stylist!Cheers,RyanLionZion

1.description: Alejandro is the only person I trust to drastically cut my hair. Granted, I rarely even cut it, but I've been going to him for 5+ years (wow...I'm old) and he always does such a fantastic job. I'm writing a review until now because I was just too impressed with his latest and greatest work of hair art, which was cutting my very ridiculously long and lifeless mane into a wonderful long bob, or as you trendy people call it "lob."  I've gotten tons of compliments on the cut and it works so well with my thick, heavy hair; so much texture and creativity! I highly recommend trusting Alejandro with all your hair changes because he's amazing.  Thanks Alejandro for restoring my faith in shorter hair :-)

55.description: I was very disappointed with the service that I recieved here. I bought a groupon for some waxing services.  They were friendly when I first went in so that was nice, although they had me down for the wrong kind of waxing.  It was weird because I noticed on the phone when I made the appointment that they didn't ask me what kind of waxing I wanted.  Then I arrived and she apparently had just decided on her own what serive I was getting.  That wasn't a huge deal though.   However I had two major problems with this place.  The first is the condition of my skin when I left.  There was significant scabbing and possible scaring that will follow. I'm not sure if it will scar or not, I only had it done a few days ago, but I have very noticable and embarrassing scabs on my face right now. So I would avoid this place if you are going in for waxing service.  I have been getting the same areas waxed for years and NEVER had anything like this happen.  It's ridiculous.  The second problem was when I went to pay, she told me that my groupon covered everything so I didn't owe anything.  I asked if I could tip her with my card because I didn't have cash on me, you know, because it's 2012! (At this point I didn't realize how terribly my skin had been treated or I would not have bothered to tip at all.)  She gave me a lot of attitude about it.  Yes, that's right!  I asked her if  could TIP her and she gives me a whole speach about how she normally doesn't like to do that and how she doesn't even make money off the groupon.  Hey guess what!  Then don't do the stupid groupon, lady!  The idea of those things is to bring new business in.  Had you done a good job and not treated me so rudely, I would have come back and you would have made money off of me.  I frequent these places alot for waxing, so you would have made a lot of money off of me if you knew what you were doing and had treated me nicely.  Now, not only am I never going back, I woudl advice anyone else to NEVER go there if they care about their skin at all.  I can't speak for their other services, but as far as waxing goes, they messed my skin up pretty badly.  I wish I could get the tip back that I gave her, not to mention the actual groupon I purchased, as it was an awful experience.

9.description: Excellent. Juanita, the esthetician, did a phenomenal job on my waxing. She takes her time, never rushed, and even fixed my butchered eye brows that a previous salon did. One eyebrow was set much higher then the other! Just picture it! She makes waxing MUCH less painful then anywhere else i've been and if you need your sensitive lady areas to be waxed I'd book an appointment with her right away. Very calming and relaxing. She is truly something special I'm sorry but you will not find another person who will wax like she does. IF you have sensitive skin, be verbal because no one is a mind reader. I don't want someone to read these reviews and then have minor irritation and say "but they had good reviews!" Yes they are very very good but you need to know what works best for you BEFORE you get anything done so you can tell that person what to use and what not to use.I have not had a mani/pedi or any other services yet so I can't say anything about that, but as far as waxing please do yourself a favor and book with Juanita, you will not be sorry! I loved my experience with her. I am glad I found her now I don't have to waste my time with anyone else. If Juanita will move, I will move too. Seriously! haha :)This five star review is for YOU Juanita!!

26.description: This place is neat!  I stumbled upon it while taking a walk in my neighborhood, and I'm glad that I did.Ambrocio is my favorite.  When I made the appointment, he asked me to bring in a picture of how I wanted my hair cut.  At the appointment, Ambrocio told me that it would take three haircuts for my hair to look like the model's in the magazine.Each time he cuts my hair, it looks better and better, plus; he is a very fun person to talk with!The only thing I wish is that the girl who does the mani-pedis could be a little bit happier.  She seemed a bit sad (or bored?) when she was doing my nails.

25.description: Very impressed with Connection Salon! Love it, great place, comfortable, relaxed. So far have gotten an up do, make up application, manicure, pedicure and hair colored...and have been more than satisfied with everything. It's apparent that all of the staff are well trained and take great pride in their work. In particular, I have to mention Ambrocio. He has done my hair both times. He really pays attention to the outcome you are trying to achieve and executes his skill flawlessly. So happy to have found him. Can't wait to have him cut my hair.

12.description: Oliver is the best! I've been going to him for almost 10 years.  He always does a great job dyeing and cutting my hair!

59.description: I don't know what has taken me so long to get a review on Yelp for Juanita! She is wonderful. I randomly went here to get my eyebrows done because it's so close to my condo. Soon, I was getting facials every so often, having my lip and eyebrows threaded, and gossiping with Juanita.She makes you feel right at home and very comfortable. Her knowledge of the dermalogica products is refreshing and she has helped me find a face wash that doesn't dry me out. Her 30 minute hydrating facial is wonderful as well! I just did microdermabrasion the other week and my skin felt soft as a baby's bottom.I'll be sad when I decide to move out of the city and cannot come here as often....or I'll just be driving in on the weekends ;) Thanks Juanita!

21.description: Great salon...  Great stylists. I was in town over the weekend from NY for a wedding and had to get my hair blowdried... Let me tell you...  I have really curly hair and had to find someone that knew how to blowdry it.. Well i found this salon.. And with that... Israel!!!! Let me tell you.. I am not exaggerating when i say he has magic fingers... I thought i could fall asleep as he washed mynhair and the blowdry... Soooo soft with the hand... Not a single tug and pull of my hair... And he got that baby nice and straight and with bounce. And he showed  products and tips i can use for my hair. Plus oliver and him were such a delight to speak to during the process... I gave it 4 stars only bc im from NY and we pay so much less for a wash and dry than here. I paid 45 without any cut . Sorry babes. Usually here its like 15 to 25 for all

17.description: Israel is amazing!  I just went here to try a neighborhood salon.  He took such good care of me.  He's a perfectionist, so I was in the chair for a long time.  But the final result was so worth it. 20% for new customers too!  I'll definitely be back!

10.description: Love my new hair cut!! Oliver was caring and thoughtful when cutting my hair. Amazing head massage and great cut. He styled and cut my hair exactly the way I wanted, sometimes stylist try and talk you out of what you want or modify to what they want but he didn't. It was excellent! The visit took a little longer than I thought but I can't really complain because Oliver was so through. Bravo!

5.description: Pleasantly surprised by this neighborhood salon. I came in for a style and Israel did a great job with a wash and blow dry. They carry all aveda and dermalogica products. And they honored a new customer discount.

3.description: 5 Stars for Juanita!I originally bought a Groupon for a Brazilian Wax about two years ago. But have recently revisited Juanita for a leg wax. Both services were done very professionally. The salon is very clean and chic. Juanita is very personable and makes you feel extremely comfortable. Every time I see her now I feel like I am at home and I have known her for quite some time. She is fast, gentle, and very precise all at the same time. Juanita also makes sure that you too are comfortable and ok. I could no,t and will not go anywhere else for these services. I highly recommend Juanita and her work, you will not be disappointed! Love you Juanita!

35.description: I am blown away!  I am a haircolor out-of-a-box kinda gal, but AMBROCIO has eternally converted me. I wanted to light up my hair from dark golden brown to caramel w blonde highlights and he did a fantastic job! He took time to ask questions, analyze my hair, understand what I want, made recommendations, and my hair came out exactly, if not better than I had ever imagined. Not only that, we chatted about my wedding day which was 2 days later, and I briefly mentioned I was gonna just 'YouTube tutorial' my bridal updo (like I said, a hair color out of a box gal) and he immediate offered an appt at 7am for me! Thank god i did that lol bc Ambrocio made me feel so wonderfully beautiful on my big day w the updo he did, and worry-free. The updo also stayed up and intact till dinner (8am-9pm). Ambrocio is passionate, driven and professional. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

19.description: I can't say enough about Alejandro and Connections Salon!  I have been going to Alejandro for the past 3 years and he is THE best.  His haircuts are on-point and he takes such  precision in his work. His counterparts, Ambrosio and Oliver are great as well from my observations on their work. I won't go anywhere else to get my hair done. This place is clean, stylish and so comfortable to just hang out.  Amazing job guys!  Keep it up.

28.description: The staff are friendly and Ambrosio is a rockstar with my hair. I will never go to anyone else for color because he nails it every time. I've had brown, red/brown, and purple/brown hair and he never disappoints.

45.description: I won't be returning to this salon ever. The pedicurist seemed very inexperienced, which showed by the way she roughly pushed by back cuticles on my toes so much that I had tell her she was hurting me. Not a good selection of colors, no soap or bath salts or anything in the tub, just warm water. I am unsure how sanitary everything was because she used a wooden file on my heels, which I know cannot be sanitized properly. The cherry on top of this whole terrible experience was that obviously in fall I wore boots... mind you I've gotten several pedicures in summer off months where shoes are worn and never have I had the pedicurist prematurely tell me that they were set enough to leave. This woman tells me she will put this oil on my nails which will prevent them from smudging, even though they're dry anyway. NOPE. Ruined by the time I got home. Had to get ready to go to a wedding 1.5 hours later and had to take off the polish completely so it didn't show in my peep toe pumps. Worst pedicure experience I've had.

33.description: this review is way overdue. i've been coming to connection for spa services for years now. i came via a brazilian wax groupon / livingsocial deal and i would never trust anyone else when it comes to waxing or my skin. juanita is very learned in her skill. she is friendly, meticulous with her work, professional, and she plays awesome music. every facial is tailored to the individual needs of her customers and i always walk out feeling beautiful and glowing. her services are also reasonably priced.

43.description: I have been going to this salon for a Brazilian Wax with Juanita for over a year now. Her work has always been nothing short of fantastic. She is extremely thorough, gentle, hygienic and friendly. You feel completely at ease under her care. Over the years I have done Brazilians in several cities and with several different estheticians and Juanita is hands down the best. Thank you Juanita for your fabulous work!

2.description: Alejandro was awesome! Listened to what I wanted and worked at my hair till it was perfect. I love my haircut!

18.description: Amazing! I went in for a facial and brow wax with Juanita and let me tell you, from the moment I walked in I felt as if we had been friends for a while.  Never an uncomfortable moment! She was great, and she was very attentive and understanding ...she did a phenomenal job on my facial, my skin feels so good! My bf was like "ur face looks cleansed, like from all the make up" I was like, u mean DIRT? because I didn't have make up on earlier! But I took it as a compliment, after I punched him in the arm,  because my skin really does look great! I'm extremely satisfied.  And my brows look great too! I jacked them up myself when I did them last, but we're on the right track to getting them back right! From this day forward, I am a new regular for Connection Salon! Juanita is My new go to girl for my esthetic needs...so glad I found her!  You gotta meet her, she's awesome!

41.description: Meh, went here for quite some time and had pretty good experiences. After awhile though, I came to lose my rosy-colored glasses.I've gotten waxing done at many different places and am generally pretty resilient. I found that every time I went here though, my skin would become red and irritated much MUCH more than at other places I've gone. Don't know if it was the wax or the particular technique Juanita has.Haircuts are usually pretty good, although for the past 6 months or so it's like every time I ask for - you know, what you did last time - Alejandro just always seems confused about what that means. As for color, I go for the ombre look (same request - can you just touch up what you did last time?- met with dubiousness) and the last time I was there it was just really not acceptable. I've got ashy dark brown hair naturally and the top was completely left alone while the bottom was pretty much...purple. Thing that annoyed me was not so much a bad color but the denial of the stylist that it actually didn't look good. I mean, it's one thing to make a mistake, but don't make me feel like an ass if I point it out, especially if I have to pay $160 and wear it on my head every day, you know?Anyway, I'm just off Connection. Worth a try, but for the price, I think I can do better.

52.description: Juanita is absolutely amazing! I've tried many places and I am very picky when it comes to waxing, and hands down Juanita is the best! I don't live nearby, but make a point to come see Juanita for waxing each month. She has great knowledge and makes everything as painless as possible.

50.description: I had never gotten my hair colored before at a salon, never thought I was that type of person, but now I am HOOKED! Oliver did an amazing job fixing my over-bleached, orange-blonde hair. He listened to exactly what I wanted and took the extra time to get it perfect, adding highlights and 3 different shades of color. He also calculated in what it would look like as it faded, so I know I'm set for a while! He also did a deep conditioning treatment and styled it beautifully before I left. I went on a weekday, which is probably much less crowded than weekends. The atmosphere was very relaxed and everyone was very friendly. Only complaint I have is it costed a bit more than I was expecting, but since my hair was a disaster coming in it was worth it! Getting it touched up will be much cheaper. This is now my go-to salon.

4.description: A week ago, I called to find out information on the facials at Connection Salon. Since their website was not updated for their March Specials, it would be best to call and ask as well as find out prices for add-ons, as well as the type of microdermabrasion utilized at salon.I got a call back from Juanita, who identifies herself as the Esthetician that does facials among other services. We get into a conversation that lasted about 20minutes. For some, this might be alot, for me, it wasnt. I talk alot, as well as ask ALOT of questions. She was very, very informative. She gave me different opinions based off verbal, she emphasized that of course, it would be best to look at my skin. I agree, she wasnt trying to upscale anything. In fact, as I made my appointnent, she saved me almost 50% because I was getting 2 services instead of getting a long facial and a microdermabrasion. I arrived 15minutes prior to my schedule time, to look around, some places have paperwork, so I always like to arrive early. I was greeted at the front desk by Alejandro (Salon's owner), he seated me promptly, as they went to get Juanita. Usually, I'm offered water or coffee but not at this salon. Alejandro's demeanor was okay, Smile more Alejandro, you have a GREAT salon!!Juanita came a few minutes later, big smile n hip looking glasses. I can tell I'm going to like this place. She has a good persona over the phone as well as in person. I get in, she explains what will happen. She excuses herself, while I take my blouse off and put on a towel with velcro on it. I get on table. She knocks and asks if Im ready and proceeds to come in.I wont bore you with each step....but she did the facial, prepped my skin for the microderm and has the best hands to massage my face, neck and shoulders. Once she finished facial, she did the Microderm, she used the diamond tip, which is new for me. Im used to the crystal/vacum type. I will say that i like the feel of the crystals better BUT the dimond tip can be used up close under my eyes whereas the crystals you cant. Also, with crystals I would be all red after and would notice the skin softness a day later whereas with diamond tip, I looked and felt my skin look hydrated, even tone and it even looked like i had makeup on when I didnt, and it didnt look red. The finishing mask was the weird one. She handed me a wand and told me that the wand and her touching my face woukd transmit a small amount of frequency, well for me it was too much. I did not like the little shocks on my skin, as she massaged this mask on me.... she said for some it was good but not me. I dont know if it was my anxiety or what, but i felt my heart race so I told her to turn off the wand. She was very attentive when the wand was on, to see my comfort level, when I told her it was not comfortable, she immediately turned it off and kept massaging me. She then put on a moisturizer spf 25 and hydrated my horribly cracked lips.Juanita, I can see why you are very popular among Yelp users and I am happy I found you. I feel so comfortable with her that, after she comes back from her break, I will letting her do my brazilian wax. Obviously, she has a good reputation on this as well and based on my comfort level, I have made this decison of entrusting her to see me lol. Yelpies, I recommend you take a look at their website, take advantage of First-time customer 20%off discount as well as call and speak to Juanita. Remember to SPEAK UP, if you have any allergies, are on certain meds, etc. Being a nurse, I am specific with anyone doing anything to my overall body, because I take medicine and becuz of my chronic back issues. I also told her about my sensitive skin and how I have to have everything frangrance free and senstive skin labels..... BUT in case you missed anything, Juanita asked me! So she is def. On her P's and Q's. :)For the Quick Fix Facial & Microdermabrasion as an Add On, my total was 65.00 + tax= $68.00!! Tipped her 15%. Any questions, please call Juanita. 773.342.6333THANK YOU JUANITA!!

6.description: I've been coming here in the city from the northern suburbs for years because they are truly the best! My regular go to guy is Alejandro but Oliver, Israel and Juanita are highly recommended too!!! From hair to nails to skin and make up this salon has it all!! Israel does threading too!!!

22.description: I have been working with Ambrocio for 4 years already and he has always done an amazing job with my hair! From the haircuts to blonde hair to amazing ombre and highlights. Love love love love love love his work! I'm always getting compliments on my hair from random people and I 100% recommend Ambrocio! I love the atmosphere there and the people who work there!

15.description: I went to connection salon for a facial, and I had it with Juanita. She is very sweet and gentle, and I think her work is pretty good. What I like about it is she talked through the best option for my facial treatment that day before she began. One small thing that I will suggest is to emphasize the relaxing ambiance especially during the mask time, I felt that I didn't get that since I could hear her "being busy" around me, nothing major, just simply the nuance needs to be more quite during those time. Overall, it was a good experience. The microdermabrasion, facial, and treatment kit cost me about $135.

57.description: I had a terrible experience due to the lack of customer service at Connections Salon. I live two blocks away from the salon and decided to try out the salon due to it's proximity and Aveda products. I had blond highlights and a haircut. My hair is not a light lavender and I have long chopped bangs that look disturbingly like a mullet. After leaving 3 messages during business hours describing my hair issues, Alejandro (the owner) called me back and told me to just "keep washing it and hopefully the purple will eventually wash out." I have am speaking at a large conference tomorrow and the possibility that I may be speaking with lavender hair is very upsetting. I spent over $300 and instead of suggestion a toner, or even apologizing, he tells me that it may come out after a few washes. Honestly, I could have saved $290 and bought a bottle of dye and cut my own hair...and it would have looked better. I am very disappointed.

20.description: Juanie is the ONLY person I trust with my waxing!  I haven't gone to any other salon since my first appointment with her.  She shapes them so beautifully, plays 90's R&B in the background and I get to enjoy girl talk with one of the sweetest gals.  My skin is very sensitive and she's adjusted her routine with my face so that I no longer leave with redness.  She always spends extra time to make sure I look amazing and gives honest advice.  If you have thick, unruly, thin, or even naturally faded brows, go to her!  She's also a makeup artist and can help you out with filling them in properly.  You'll leave looking like a beauty queen.  :)

36.description: This salon is a must! Not everyone is easy to please, but they definitely won me over as a client! I am happy to say that Ambrocio is now my permanent stylist... I went on a leap of faith going to a completely new salon with out knowing anyone that had personal experiences, but I am super happy that I did! My old stylist just had my hair a mess, and Ambrocio literally transformed my hair. He definitely cares about his clients and most certainly loves what he does for a living, my hair is living proof! The salon was a very comfy atmosphere, shampoo bowl is super comfy, and residential parking is always a plus :-). He is truly an hair guru :-) Thank you Connection Salon for hooking a sistah up!! Oh also, 20% off for fist time clients, discounts are always good in my book! lol

14.description: Very impressed with Connection Salon! Love it, great place, comfortable, relaxed. So far have gotten an up do, make up application, manicure, pedicure and hair colored...and have been more than satisfied with everything. It's apparent that all of the staff are well trained and take great pride in their work. In particular, I have to mention Ambrocio. He has done my hair both times. He really pays attention to the outcome you are trying to achieve and executes his skill flawlessly. So happy to have found him. Can't wait to have him cut my hair.

3.description: Usually I have no problems.  But today the girls there where so RUDE. As im placing my order the girl at the counter is talking about her boyfriend and telling her co-worker what toppings to put on her personal sandwich so she OF COURSE over charges me & totally gets my order WRONG, when I correct her and tell her she has my order wrong, all 3 girls get hissy & act as if I made the mistake. I asked to speak to the manager and of course one or the girls is it.. they are ghetto, rude & ignorant.

1.description: This is a great Place to get coffee if you are really into being treated bad. Like if you have some weird thing where you don't like being acknowledged come here, and you can get your coffee however they feel like giving it to you. Then when you're done for your convenience they'll just set your order down on the counter and walk off so pay attention just incase you want what you bought.

2.description: So slow. The girls that work here are sweet, but they should hire more people to work in the morning. One behind the cash register and one making the orders just doesn't seem like enough.I don't come in here often but when I do the line is always long. Even though this is closer to my house in the morning, I always wait to go to the Dunkin by my work.

5.description: A Tiger Woods drive away from the casa, i'm all about this brand new DD's location, location, location.  The two sister's who run this outfit are exceedingly gracious, charming and all around lovely.  It's sat inside the Division/Cali Citgo and although it's not terribly big, they do have a solid selection of bagels and donuts.  Check it out if you're in the area and in need of the morning coffee and snack.

6.description: convenient,friendly people,and fresh coffee :)

0.description: this is my local Dunkin and I am happy with it. It is one of those little ones in the gas station, and they have a limited selection of donuts and bagels so it is not getting 4 stars from me. I was in there one morning and the Dunkin inspector from corporate was in there reminding them that they have to have some minimum number of donuts and bagels at all times. I always thought they had too few of these. I come for the coffee and a bagel sandwich so I am happy. If they don't have the multi-grain I take my bagel from one of the couple they have. I wish they had 31 kinds of bagel, but hey, this isn't Kaufman's in Skokie (wow I love that place!). My coffee is always the way I want it, the folks who work here are nice, and I am on the road with my Dunkin in just a few minutes. Awesome.

4.description: I am a regular at this Dunkin Donuts.  All of the ladies that work here in the morning are a pleasure.  They usually remember my order and are very nice.  My only complaint is the gentleman who runs the food station.  I honestly have never seen anyone move slower than this guy.  He takes his sweet time in the morning doing things that seem out of order and most likely not the way Dunkin Donuts taught him to do his job.  I am usually very tolerant and patient as I worked in food service for over 6yrs.- but the other day was the last straw(pun intended)  - Dude was working while chewing on a coffee stirrer straw(basically a slide for spit) while working on the food that I was going to eat.  To top it off someone must have told him to take it out of his mouth, and where does he put it?  Right on the food prep table where he was going to put my sandwich. I nearly gagged when I saw him put my bun down not more than 3 inches away from his chewed up straw. (*yuck*).  Needless to say I haven't ordered food when he is working since.  Lucky for them I am a DD junkie and this is  my most convenient stop on the way to work to get my fix.  I just won't be eating as many breakfast sandwiches from now on.

3.description: Mr Gyros HP is the best! Great food and great staff! If you're in the area, check it out!

1.description: My star rating is not in regards to the food because I didn't eat here.  The place seemed relatively clean and the young lady taking orders was nice.My problem was the prices are too high in my opinion for that area.  It already is in a location that I wouldn't want to go to at night and for it to be a neighborhood type greasy spoon place then I don't expect to pay over $7 for a gyro or an Italian beef with no fries.This place maybe great but I'm not willing to pay their prices!Enjoy!

2.description: Great customer service, best Italian beef I've had in a long time. The owner even came to our table and gave me a free desert.

0.description: Who doesn't love to buy a gyro and get one free? I don't know about other people, but I feel like it doesn't count as a cheat day on my otherwise healthy diet if my husband orders a gyro and doesn't have to pay for mine.... They are delish. Cheese fries are awesome as well. The area isn't the best, but none of the best comfort food joints are.

12.description: Headed over here after an art gallery around the corner, and had a great time with the staff, family and friends.  The drinks are strong, and the beer list has the usual suspects and a few craft beers for the connoisseurs.  Definitely worth a stop if you're in the area, and even if you're not.  Make sure to bring your dancing shoes for some late night salsa.

7.description: A work in progress. This place has serious potential. The patio is spacious and  with nice lighting and comfortable chairs. The bar are has big TVs lots of liquor bottles to entice you. But there is not kitchen and no taps! I am draft beer drinker by trade, so no tap handles hurts my heart. The bartender however inspired confidence as he spoke of renovations including a forthcoming kitchen, a renovated upstairs area and some NFL sunday deals. I would come back because of the relaxed atmosphere the easy and free street parking. Though I am not going to rush back until there are ample bar snacks!

19.description: Love this bar!  Have an amazing patio with great sun and faces the park. Drinks were awesome, had the raspberry mojito. They have bags and beer pong table outside and a mix of lounge chairs and tables. The staff is so friendly. This is a great new addition to the neighborhood and can't wait for their upstairs remodel to be complete (adding a lounge and food).

1.description: Nice place but man the bartender was useless. We sat at the bar, 5 minutes later she came by and said nothing, no acknowledgement, nothing, then walks away from us. We were going to leave then BUT we decided to give her another shot since it was busy.  Waited another 5+ minutes, she comes by again and the same thing happens. "F-this man" we left, she didn't seem to care. Music's so loud you can't even think anyways. Don't waste your time and money here.We stopped in at the "Boulevard" down the street, cool bartender, nice place, bigger TV's, and good seating!

2.description: All of the good reviews are from Yelpers with less than 10 reviews.  Odd.  Patrons can be quite rude, and the bartenders have seemed to share the same attitude.  I don't hate this place, but it is so disappointing that it isn't better.  I went a couple times and would rather travel from the area than bring my business back.

9.description: Always a great time! Love this place! Great vibes and music. Would definitely recommend!!

6.description: I love it here!!! I have been here a few times for  different events.it was the same outcome- Fun, good music, friendly staff and very diverse crowd. You can come in with your sports gear and watch some games or come in with a nice little dress and dance the night away. This is definitely my new "Go to bar".

18.description: Great place, stopped in here to watch the USA v. Germany game during the World Cup. The beer (I had Negra Modelo, the girlfriend had Corona and a friend had a local Chicago brew) was almost ridiculously cheap for imports and micro-brews. The bartenders are really friendly and the clientele are friendly and talkative. They were just finishing remodeling the outside deck seating area when we were there (last time I drove by they were putting up a giant television for the deck area). They don't serve food yet, but there are like 5 of the best Puerto Rican food trucks that I've  ever been to right across the street and they let you bring it into the bar! In fact, they actively encourage it, even recommending what we should order. I would recommend this place as an after work spot with friends or to watch a game. Not sure what the night crowd is like as I left around 7 or 8.

10.description: Humble Bar is just that, Great Staff all the way up to ownership. Everyone in this place  was having a good time!!Plasma TV's surrounding the walls like art work. Just a Awesome atmosphere .Cheers

13.description: Place is awesome random stop and had a great time with my friends and there staff is very friendly

16.description: What a great place to chill with good company! Drinks are tasty and the staff friendly. Love the huge patio! I've found my summer hangout bar.

17.description: Went there after the Nutcracker ballet (good.time), from up north, on my way home. People there  were freindly, receptive, n fun...its a sports bar with some flavor.  Hell they host teachers n other professionals to let their hair hang out....Check it out for urself.

15.description: No

0.description: I brought a meetup group here for a pub crawl and I have to say, setting it up with the employees here was fantastic! everyone I worked with was amazing! The drinks were great! Everyone was attentive! There's an awesome patio and free pool!

5.description: We tried to have a drink at this place because it looked cool. They had a huge patio, dancing upstairs, and pool tables, ect., but the service was terrible. There was one bartender for the whole downstairs bar. When we came in it took her forever to even notice us. 20 min later she acknowledged us but didn't take our order. We ended up leaving without buying anything and headed over to the boulevard bar instead.

11.description: I love this place! What first caught my eye while driving by one day was their patio.  A week later a group of us decided to check it out and I'm so glad we did.  The staff Ary and Kiki are amazing they are very attentive, accommodating and sweet.  After visiting a few times I decided to have my birthday party there and just recently hosted a luncheon in the sleek party room.  If you are looking for a chill bar with great prices check this place out!!! The patio is great they have bags set up to play, a projector screen outside, and they grill hot dogs on game days for everyone.

8.description: Awesome spot to catch a game on tv. The bartender this night was great.  Suggested a few great drinks. I wasn't disappointed. Reasonably priced as well.

3.description: I can't give it less then one star. But if I could I would. This was my father's experience:We were led to the door by the owner after greeting friends to loudly. When we went by the bar to explain ourselves and make amends when the bartender tells us to shut our mouths. Never have I ever been disrespected in such a manner after spending good money at an establishment. Our family and friends involved won't be going back.

14.description: Great atmosphere, affordable drinks, friendly service and a beautiful outdoor deck: I found my new nightly haunt :)

4.description: This place is awful. Apparently my gringa money is not welcome here. I live across the street and was excited to see it open, have been multiple times but will not be going back.  Owner has very strong anti gentrification feelings and is very vocal about it.  He was against Riot Fest.  Seems pretty stupid to me, since you are located across from the park.  I won't be spending money at an establishment that doesn't welcome me or want my business.

0.description: Great atmosphere, all the Four Loko you could want, Zingers right there on the shelf, plenty of lotto tickets, and your only source for Ozone Vodka in Chicago!I recommend stopping by at night, when the party is in full effect! Ask for P-Dogg!

3.description: Why is CVS so damn bright! I'm spoiled on Walgreens store layout I supposed. Can't do CVS.

1.description: I have used this location for a nice bit of time now. No longer. First there are rats all up in the bushes and around the building... Secondly it has taken over thirty minutes at the window to get service even with three staff inside. Jewel is cheaper and I don't have to wait thirty while everyone chit chats and catches up.... and seriously rats all out front GROSS

2.description: Fast, friendly service! I like that they have a drive thru pharmacy, that way when I'm in a Rush I don't even have to leave my car! I am always in and out, I hate that they only have one person working at the cash register but this is common at CVS and there usually aren't that many people in line anyway!

0.description: I will totally agree with Heather's assessment that there's almost NEVER more than one friggin checker at this place, no matter how many people are in line.  For that matter, I am so NOT A FAN of the way CVS does checkouts anyway.  You don't line up at separate checkouts, parallel to the counter, a la Walgreen's.  Instead, usually some half-assed non-line cluster forms, a few feet from the one-and-only counter containing several registers.  Basically, you stand there (and depending on the size or layout of the store, you're butted up against bins of candy, stacks of 2-liters or just generally 'in the way'), then you wait for the cashier to (maybe) call you up.  About half the time, another customer, unaware that such a non-line exists, comes along and cuts in front of everyone, or at least tries.  CVS, please get a system, maybe old- fashioned NUMBERED checkout counters, like all other stores?  Or at least dedicate a place in front of the counter where people can line up in an orderly fashion.  And last, if another register DOES open, don't just let everyone scramble up there.  Next in line gets the new cashier.  Got all that?Second complaint: the parking lot.  The store is ON the corner of North and Kostner, yet you either have to go WAY west on North or enter on Kostner, then drive all the way around the building to get into the parking lot, like it's the third ring of hell.  Given the neighborhood, that's not so far off (I live near here, I can say that).  I'm guessing it's like this to avoid quick escape?Other than that, nice store, better than your average CVS, staff are friendly, once you actually talk to one.  Don't expect a liquor selection anything like 'my' other CVS (Grand and Central Park/Division), though.

4.description: Okay, I like CVS. They always give me extra bucks for buying stuff I had to buy anyway. Cool. But, the 24-hour CVS next to my apartment building is the worst, and I mean THE WORST, CVS. Actually, the worst drug/convenience/food store ever. I mean, you would think that living next to a 24-hour store of any kind would be awesome. Especially since they serve liquor until 2am, right? Of course not.I've lived in this neighborhood for 8 months now and I often frequent the store. I've seen them have one lane open on a weekend night with a cashier under 21, causing her to have to call an over-21 checker to make every alcohol sale. On a weekend night in my neighborhood, 85% of the people on line have some liquor in their hand ready to purchase.I've gone there for the most mundane of items, of which they are often out of stock Being hung-over, in your pajamas and having to get in your car to drive somewhere because the rat hole store next to you is out of half and half is irritating as hell. Well, I can imagine it would be anyway.Through those many, many, many, many times this store has been a disappointment, I always go back. I made so many excuses in my mind, like, lack of staff, the relatively new location, whatever. But, tonight, when this god forsaken CVS almost burned down my apartment and ruined my dinner, I realized it's the worst managed, worst serviced store in my experience with the chain. And I'm finally going to complain.All I wanted to do was get some diet Pepsi to go with my food. Just 1 bottle of pop, that's all. I thought, "Why don't I go to the store that is across the street from my house"? That's a normal thought process involving a normal neighborhood store. So I figured that my pasta sauce would be fine simmering on the stove for 5 or 10 minutes. The time it would take to walk back-and-forth from a normal store for such a normal sale.So it took me all of 30-45 seconds to walk in and grab my drink and head to the checkout. Well, there were 5 people in front of me. All obviously checking off their entire weekly shopping list by the amount of items in their carts and baskets. There was only one lane open. The manager was 'busy' stocking beer. Why in the world would the manager be stocking instead of opening another lane when there are that many customers? Do you know? If so, please enlighten me because I sure don't. Especially when I swear that the checker was so slow that I had read all about Britney's comeback before she started on the next customer. This customer has a LINK card, which doesn't work, so they have to spend a good 5 minutes on that. Now it's been 15 or so minutes, and I've still got 3 people in front of me. Now I start looking across the street at my kitchen window for any sign of flickering flames. I look forward and see she is still bagging the effing welfare recipient's items and I lost it. I marched back to the fridge, threw my pop inside and slammed the fridge door while muttering angry four letter words on my march to the front door. Running back to your apartment in frigid temperatures, through an icy alley, up frozen metal stairs to just be happy there's no smoke then to realize you have to now drink plain ass water with your pasta is beyond what this loquacious tirade can express.I'm done with this store. It's like it isn't even there anymore. It's dead to me.

1.description: Incredibly amazing place and has a really nice charm. All the pieces I sought were in immaculate condition, and having known what I was looking for, they were fairly priced. Lynne is an absolutely wonderful person and will answer any question you have. They have  a great curation of furniture and an aesthetic that is getting harder to find. I recommend this place full well. The lack of parking is a bit frustrating, though is in no part the stores fault.

9.description: Lynne was fabulous. This was my first time in, but she made me feel like I had been there a million times before. She's gifted at customer service.I found something I wanted immediately, which never happens to me in vintage stores, thanks to their impeccable taste. Lynne helped me get it checked out and set up delivery easily and quickly, while offering me (and the other folks in the store, who hadn't bought anything) a cold beer! How great is that?Oh, and by the way, the dining set I bought was a steal. As Lynne said "this isn't a museum; I want to keep things moving!"  And just two hours later, I'm home typing this review on my new table.5 stars easily. Will be back later this week for one of the three swanky couches I saw today.

12.description: The only reason it's four stars out of five is it is out of the way and in my opinion it could be bigger/ more selection. However, the owner alone deserves beyond five stars!
